name: Gambler (Keypunch Software)
overview: Compilation of 4 gambling games:- Blackjack - Beat the house at the classic game of 21. Poker - Play Five Card Stud against four computer controlled hands. Slots - Place your bet, pull the handle and take your chance. Derby Days - Around the club house, turn and into the final stretch with 3 year olds and up at Sunny Downs.
